DOC.brief_summary: Epidemiological data collection of adult patients affected by myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) newly diagnosed.
DOC.detailed_description: Development of an Italian regional registries MDS network using the same electronic case report form for data storage, with the following broad aims: - Ability to aggregate and process anonymous epidemiological data collected by individual regional registers; - Ability to aggregate the available data with those of other international registries existing.
DOC.criteria: New diagnosis of MDS Patient who refuse the signature of informed consent
